name: the adventures of the snake
description:
Development

This game was created by a 10 year old child in 20 hours of time.

Game History

This story is about one little snake who was born not like everyone else. She had two heads.

No one wanted to communicate with her and she was kicked out of the family.

So she was left alone in the jungle. But she will never be alone, because she has two heads. Together they will pass all the tests.

Management

Left                     A

Right                   D

Jump                  Space

Climb up / swim   W

Climb down          S
